Branch Wow Components.name: Date input
Branch Wow Components.description: Dropdown combination for day, month, year with all validated. Used for DOB, issue and expiry dates.

Branch Wow Components.name: QAS component
Branch Wow Components.description: Predictive address list as a user type to input field

HLTP components.name: Sortable table acordion
HLTP components.description: A table which can display data from a list of records with in-built features of sorting and pagination. Driven by reference data.

HLTP components.name: Validate
HLTP components.description: A directive which is intented to handle the day-to-day validation on different input fields with flexibility of validation on the fly and on blur. Multiple types of validation like required, maxLength, maxValue, requiredLength, formattingOnBlur, convert the value to float on the fly and on blur, additional business validation on blur and on change.

HLTP components.name: Popup warning
HLTP components.description: A generic modal used to display a warning in the application. Title, content and footer actions can be sent as parameters.

HLTP components.name: Form change
HLTP components.description: A generic directive to be declared on form to trigger and event on form change.

HLTP components.name: Card (home loan)
HLTP components.description: A medium sized home loan card with basic information.

HLTP components.name: Customer Search
HLTP components.description: UI-tab for searching for a customer based on few identifiers and demographics.

HLTP components.name: Review card
HLTP components.description: A large sized homeLoan card with repricing information.

HLTP components.name: Filters
HLTP components.description: Generic filters like date parser, adding a particular field in a list, auto detection of localhost to pick mock data etc.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: Maintain customer screen
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Modified panel from bootstrap and GEL. Have an edit or delete button.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: IDV documents
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Modified panel from bootstrap and GEL. Have an edit or delete button.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: IDV
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Modified panel from bootstrap and GEL. Have an edit or delete button.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: Tiles for multi-selection
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Used for giving an option to choose multiple options together and displaying extra information about the selection.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: Decision tree
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Non-UI set of utility functions used to move back and forth in a set of pages and to help in decision based page flows.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: Combobox
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Searchable dropdown, which supports a dropdown feature as well as a suggestive search feature.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: Date helper
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Non-UI utlity that provides methods for date manipulations/date comparisons. Also provides a few fixes for browser compatibilities of date pickers.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: Validators
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Non-UI utlity that is acentralized place for keeping all regular expressions which can be reused throughout the application and can be easily maintainable.

Sol+/Ce+ Components.name: User factory
Sol+/Ce+ Components.description: Non-UI utility that is a redefined factory used for ARC user login/user roles related functionality.
